But then again i don't really have a reason to be dishonest just now. hahaha

Also saw the new HBO miniseries on Elizabeth the First and loved the line about what women hate, which is of course liars. Yay all i have to do is write around it so i can flesh out all the info i drone one about for 38 pages lol. ahhhh i get to see Jack in approx 21 days!!!! muahahahhaa 

I decided not to see that other guy Lee, its not like it would be cheating (though it would feel like it to me) but seriously i'm still in Ky for the moment, he's in Miami and even though i'll be doing a photo shoot in Miami this weekend i just don't have the energy to deal with a man that's not jack, a man who doesn't sound, act, or anything like jack. uh oh i've fallen for the british man, but then again i already knew that! And what did i think was going to happen in miami? That i would feel like i had options in case jack doesn't work out, that i would remove the pressure of jack by going out with another guy, am i so in need of attention? This all goes back to that quote and my conscience using my own feelings of guilt b/c i was brought up never to do something to someone that you wouldn't want done to you, i mean i would feel guilty, and like such a bitch. Also i have to keep focus on the fact that i want to continue to be the person i see myself as, ie not a bitch, not a cheater, not fickle and etc. Though sometimes being "good" does have its drawbacks...like this guy is hot and i shouldn't have guilt or regret over a fling when jack and i still aren't together and he can't voice the words in an actual sentence lol. Can you feel guilt over doing something that isn't bad? What the hell is wrong with me? I've got way too many loyalty issues, loyalty is very important to me especially since i've had psychotic abusive cheating bfs in the past. Perhaps that's the reason?

Oh and get this Coast Guard Lee is a Pysch major...who's getting his PHD lol i do not need him in my head, or as a reference case study ever! Plus Jack is older and i do have a thing for older men.... :) But then again 27 isn't that old hahahaha. 

ok back to my paper and my latin studies!

Sad that Keeneland is now closed, it was a fun season lots of horse races (thankfully i wasn't there the day they had to put down that one horse...it was so sad. :( but other than that incident the party was the shit)
Man i haven't drank that much since the fashion show and the last 4th of July lol, and before that i haven't drank that much since i was out at sandbar with D and that asshole put something in my drink (tox report! gahhh) and i ended up in the hospital not only with a severe hangover but groggy drug haze and a minor concussion from when i fell down (when i passed out in hecht lobby and had to go for a ride in the ambulance) booooo my third least fav college memory...the other two i think are obvious to anyone who knows me.
But seriously who puts shit in drinks like that? I was concerned until i remembered that it wasn't the alcohol last time. And i did drink way more than that at last year's 4th of July celebration muahahahaha. 3 amaretto sours
2 lemon drops
1 apple martini
1 margarita
2 cranberry and vodka (my fav drink) lol i think that was quite enough alcohol for one day and then i cut myself off at 2pm b/c seriously i needed to be able to mix the drinks and not have a dazed and buzzed expression on my face lol. 
Maybe Pedro was right i don't have a prob with alcohol i just like to be drunk...therefore i'm a drunk not an alcoholic....lol. Weird terminology i know but oh well.  But then again i only get "off my ass drunk" every four months or longer hmmmm so i guess i'm not good at being a regular drunk perhaps i need to drink more often?  i like social drinking but sometimes you just need to be drunk! Like after a breakup, during a bad relationship, during a really bad movie (lol) or during a class you wish would just end! 

I do have one friend who is an alcoholic i mean this person who will remain nameless but i think we can all guess who it is lol has a set of 3 shot glasses in his glove compartment and a bottle of tequila! The same person who convinced me to drink 30 shots of tequila to win a shot contest....(note i am never going to do that again...talk about thinking you're going to die!!).  

Also i got a phone number....from a guy named Lee in miami who is only going off my myspace profile pic....and thinks i'm pretty and we've been talking back and forth rather innocently the last couple of days but he wants to go out for drinks...hmmm should i? should i go out for drinks with a cute guy who works with the coast guard or is that wrong b/c of jack? i mean jack and i aren't together yet, i want us to be but the man is so damn shy he can't muster up the courage to say "hey i like you let's go out" but he's pining for my ass and his friend declares he's in love with me and even forwarded me an email jack sent him discussing how much he is in love with me. I just don't know why he can't say it himself...i think i'm making it clear that he won't be rejected i'm not one for "hard to get" games, i hate games! 
bleh maybe i will go out, i haven't been out on a real date in a long time. It would be nice and he seems funny and sweet....and cute he is my type tall and blonde! lol i need to go to bed i ramble on and on at 4am.....so hopefully this post isn't just a string of random nothings that make no sense. 

Also saw the movies Red Eye, Walk the Line, Intermission (hilarious), and finally Lord of the Rings 3 (longest and often the most unintentionally funny movie ever!) good times i especially liked in Walk the Line when June Carter helped him get off drugs and the way she did it. watch P&P, Eliabeth, and must stop watching the Professional obsessively i've seen this movie a hundred times at least since 1994 but i can't stop its addictive!

Jack is in good spirits despite papers he has to write but i actually helped him find sources and looked over for info in some of the books we both have. :) yay i'm helpful. Also am seeing the Libertine with the incomparable Johnny Depp and fellow Kentuckian tomorrow with my sister as her 28th b-day will be upon us shortly (Sunday) as she gasps at beauty of Depp and i drool over him and his historically lecherous character....Lord Wilmot an Earl of Rochester in the Restoration period....or for non history buffs post Cromwell when Charles 2nd regained the throne and Wilmot (before disfavor) was one of his favorites and friends though a debaucher at heart....oh to be alive and fornicating in the 1600s...and yes i did just write that! lol i would totally do it just to get at the dresses but one day i will happily buy one...i mean after all my sis did buy a true southern belle gown and all the trappings that go with it and wears it occasionally! I want an Elizabethan and Restoration style dresses. 
Then after that we intend to go see V for Vendetta!! yay i am so excited i'm been wanting to see this movie for a long time, and i've even been debating with people who call him a terrorist that the founding fathers of this country could very well be called terrorists too...plus the govt in this movie/graphic novel isn't exactly the most democratic govt or socialist govt i've ever heard of especially since Britain is socialist under its constitutional monarchy. 

The time is near at hand to go to NYC to present R and i am so nervous, but have run through the presentation, and i feel kind of sick and wonder if my images and story boards are enough to go with the script...boo i hate being nervous and i love the fact that i own this piece of work through copyright and etc but i am not loving the idea of giving her up and possibly having her bastardized....but hey i'm hoping they'll keep me for the filming! muahahahhaha i want so badly to go to Africa! Not sure if they'll take R but the "buzz" has been good so maybe *crosses fingers* Though the filming might not take place for a year b/c of scheduling i've been warned, so maybe what they've heard and read so far (you have to mail the script to an agent so they can read it after they've agreed to represent you, and they pitch around the possibility of a script for it w/ the idea) is good enough to warrant "buzz" who knows? i'm nauseated, nervous, and in general panic i'll throw up on someone! This time i hope that the meeting isn't post-poned again even though i called for the last postponement (how is this spelled? gahhh i need spellcheck). lol oh well must think happy thoughts...while being realistic and non expectant...hell they could buy it for a dollar and i'd be pleased just to be out there! hmmm maybe not for a dollar though. lol But then again it is like i always say and is from one of my fav novels "i expect nothing, only hope." The Joy Luck Club god i love that movie.


I was just laughing at the idea that someone got a restraining order against Paris Hilton....and how easily it was done..either she showed up to court like she was summoned to do or the guy filed ex parte and had witnesses to the fact that she had been harassing him. Suddenly i realized as my last letter to the court explained that had i known about ex parte before hand i would have filed that way....as i, the police, the Dean of student's office, Fletch (i should call him too i haven't seen him since he took that new job lol but he's so sweet and nice and Layla is a great gf for him!!! She's the less abrasive counterpoint that he def needed) and the hospital agree that i have enough evidence to lock his sorry ass up and at the very least get a restraining order (some of this info is in the private journal entry i previously wrote...but needs saying here b/c there's no other personal info here :) ) ex parte.  
So in short i would have a full year long order if i had filed that way. Too bad i didn't but at least all the temp ones allowed me to have peace of mind and sleep at night.

Also if you ignore a judges summons...even if in a letter (as i've stated before)you explain you cannot get there it doesn't look good on you. If you're innocent you go and defend yourself but in this case he cannot say he is innocent as everyone could tell and be a witness to court if necessary.  It doesn't matter if you can't really afford to get some place you have to show up, and all those other lies he told also don't make him look very good, the bailiff even said as much. Dean Sandler said that his past manipulative behavior coupled with the email and instant messenger threats of death and his suicide were enough to get him convicted of at least aggravated assault and battery if not the abuse which the hospital could back up for a full on assualt charge.

So ends that downer......just had to say it again b/c i thought the Paris Hilton thing was funny, but then again she actually showed up for court (i believe) b/c otherwise you acn't get a restraining order unless its filed so that the other person doesn't have to be in the court with you...which i should have done. :)
ok til next time...when i only tell tales of Ernie and me going hither and dither and movie opinions!

I am Jane Austen's slave....well not really but as a fellow Sagitarius i feel that she and i can identify a lot with one another, and her works are so funny and romantic that i have loved her sense laying my hands on my first copy of Pride and Prejudice when i was 12, the brillaince of it can hardly be described in a way that will do it justice! I have since then read all her works, except Sanditon b/c it was not finished by her and i cannot accept another writer in her place.  :)
Obsessive...yes i'm well aware of that. My sister and i were talking about her works and she likened me to Elizabeth Bennet and Marianne Dashwood (yay) and said that i have had my Wickam/Willoughby and now must find my Darcy/Brandon to be with forever and to find romance, rapture and delight in a man worthy of love and loving. We're such romantics. But who could not be with such lives as we have led? Surely we would not have had so many trials if there wasn't something better down the road for us! I'm a little Pollyanna these days, b/c i feel that the magic of love and being swept off my feet will happen b/c now i'm not going to settle for just anyone like i did with the last two bfs including pyscho and Matt, but the only way i'm going to be with someone forever is if i get the fairytale i deserve and have longed for my whole life. My story so far has fairytale like qualities....girl goes through trials of sadness, meets a horrible man who hurts her but she prevails in the end to meet the hero and be rescued by him not only physically but mentally as well b/c he helps her realize so much through his love. Alright i've realized my cynical ass just went pollyanna but i can't help it, i'm in a good mood and i have been in a good mood since i got the first restraining order! :)

Well kiddies in an attempt to get over to england for vogue, my new start date *after all paper work is done* is May 1st :) I cannot wait, i love the idea of an internship, but i have decided to take a full time insurance job/media job or any job that this company places me with! woot woot. i'm  excited about that as well, cause any setup help i can get is appreciated! And also i can make the internship part time as well....i mean seriously how many photographs can one person be taking/proofing/grabbing coffee(?)/editing/setting up equipment shots and etc?  Well decided is a strong word, but we'll see!  But i am so grateful to them for changing the date of my internship and being patient with me, i knew they liked my portfolio but i was unaware of how much they do like me! I mean to be so patient just makes me feel overwhelmed by happiness....and yes i cried like a little girl when i found it all out. oh happy day.

My UK journalism friend Allie will be helping me set up in my apartment, though she will have to drive in from Glouchestershire *hope am spelling that right....* Also my three natives *formerly known as my imports (including the now famous among my friends Jack, who was my valentine hehehehehe) and i am now their "yankee import" or "the symbol of colonial agression's realization of the wrong they have committed against the former empire of Britain" lol Dude this is so awesome, i again say i cannot wait, but they're taking me out to dinner after we've dropped off my stuff *must remember to book flight for a weekend or something of the like* and have a jolly good time!
hurrah i am not a love pariah! Nor am i any longer a magnet for emotional and psychological abusive fuckwits!!!!!!

Also good news on the weight front! I have lost 15lbs and now weigh in at (though not as good before whole pyscho ex-bf situation) 147lbs no joke either certified by doctors visit, my goal is to get back to the weight that i was during the time i was dating Matt (i should call him, it has been two weeks since i've talked to him!) 120! My clothes don't fit in that wonderful damnit they're so big on me now great way! My breasts are shrinking too, thank god i was so tired of them being so big! 
But i am happy that i can say i am not being anorexic again, i'm just going swimming and jogging again one or the other every day, so its not that hard to see how its come off.  I'm five feet nine inches and i want my old weight back again...i've gained way way too much weight even though it did give me larger breasts and the appearence of hips...but seriously i hate being fat. And let's face it i was and sort of still am fat.
I've realized that i've only stepped out of my dating pattern the one time(by dating pattern i mean someone who looks like a guy i would find handsome like Daniel Lepaine, Val Kilmer, Charlie Hunnam, Hugh Grant, Alan Rickman, Jude Law...i mean i have dated a male model before people, though he was a douche bag lol and not as funny as the Homeland Security guy), and i paid dearly for it, it turns out that i downgraded to V when i dated him, which is sad really and my sister is right once you look at him (outside of the abuse/psychotic tendencies) he's not handsome....anyways enough of that just have to remind myself never to go out with someone whom is not handsome, not funny, and certainly not nice ever again! In short no more downgrading....and obviously Jack is not a downgrade but in so many more ways than just looks too, he's almost too perfect and i can't wait to enjoy his flaws, let's just hope he'll like mine as well...but we seem to be getting on rather well. It's so nice to know for certain that someone likes you and wants to be with you and won't treat you like shit. i'm almost afraid to believe in it for fear that my hopes will be dashed and that i've raised him on some sort of pedestal...hmmm need to make a con list for him (ernie's idea) so i make sure he's not lifted too high in my eyes).


I must look my absolute best for new job, new man, and new country!

Dreamworks is still a go, now that not only have i copyrighted R(its been C'd for over a year now!) drawn everything, researched to the nines (despite a psychos obvious attempt to make me believe that i know nothing, obviously he didn't understand that i am a history major, as well as an art major mainly Colonial, Elizabethan and Middle Ages as my areas of specialization...but i've now read 8 books on Africa and know the history rather well for the limited info there is on African history for the period of study i am interested in! However i am a historian and know a helluva lot more than he ever will about any time in history b/c of my dad, a history teacher, and my own studies....plus i am way more intelligent than him too......3.52 GPA bitches!! hehehe despite having a grand total of 8 surgeries while at UMiami, the five on my arm, appendicitis, two laperscopies and dealing with one psycho). *grins*  Certified by my transcript finally getting here! woo hoo Yes Yes i only now wish i didn't turn down the opportunity to type up a paper and graduate with honors, damnit! oh hindsight how you taunt me!

Ahhh i'm proud but also kind of sad at the thought that now that R is finished once i give her away she'll have to be taken care of by some other person. But it doesn't matter, all will be well! But as Hemingway said "what is moral is what makes you feel good." Or very near that quote is what he said. lol
Next i have to copyright all my other stories too, but what i truly want is to be a photographer and capture beauty, be an illustrator an tell stories with the way i draw. i want to be an artist, art is why i get up in the morning, its why i wake up in the middle of the night to paint until dawn, i feel very passionate about art, there is a fire inside of me that feels like its going to burst sometimes when i can't immediately go to a canvas when i have an idea....the reckless restless realization that my soul is at the very least tormented.....perhaps one of the girls from my floor is right...i'm very nearly Van Gogh lol. I think being a good artist means you may not always be creating something but your brain is always keen to find something to create, like it bristles with anticipation for that spark of imagination/inspiration that will burn quickly through the synapses, but until then it is dormant...like a fire barely crawling on my brain, ignited but not too loud. i am in love with art, and i hope that good luck will find me, that love and art will find me and allow me to express it *at a hopefully decent price so that i am not starving and depressed anymore like i was when i was 16 and then again when i dated that pyscho* hopefully having been through so much something good will happen now. 98 four leaf clovers cannot be for naught right? I may need therapy after all.  Only three friends know the extent of what has happened, and i'm sure they wish they didn't remember the details (which is why i made a few entries for friends only or private) b/c i don't want everyone to know all about that, its too much information and i have pride issues....i mean i won't even let people help me when my heart prob acts up...lol i'm stubborn and prideful. A red haired mule.
